channel.title: Award ideas
channel.description:
Now that we have a completely different layout, I was wondering, what other awards could we have? For obvious reasons the PVP award is no longer up for grabs because people can't PVP. Do you guys think the current layout of awards are okay, or do we need more, if so what?
I was thinking a PvE award potentially.

item.title: Award ideas
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Bumping old topic, sue me

Helpful player award maybe? Someone who always does an outstanding job helping out new players and players who have been around for a while. Thoughts?

Read full topic

item.title: Award ideas
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Phaze One:

I’m all for the joke awards that were suggested like Herobrine and such. There could be one for mob manipulation maybe?

That doesn’t sound like a bad idea, but what would the awards be for, I mean I know they’re joke awards but then have to have guidelines right?

Read full topic
